snippet: Twickenham, the home of English rugby, has banned two fans for two years for homophobic abuse aimed at gay Welsh referee Nigel Owens at a recent international against New Zealand....

headline.print_headline: Twickenham Bans Fans for Homophobic Abuse of Referee
headline.main: Twickenham Bans Fans for Homophobic Abuse of Referee

lead_paragraph: Twickenham, the home of English rugby, has banned two fans for two years for homophobic abuse aimed at gay Welsh referee Nigel Owens at a recent international against New Zealand.
